Both captures came from printer in main menu
It is the first of the four sections of the Display.

This was captured from an V1.1.3 Mainboard:
len: 4864 bits
F8 80 00 80 00 FA 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 70 00 00 00 00 00 00 E0 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
F8 80 10 80 00 FA 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 80 90 00 00 00 00 10 10 20 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
F8 80 20 80 00 FA 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 90 A0 80 00 00 00 10 30 50 00 00 00 00 30 F0 F0 F0 F0 00
F8 80 30 80 00 FA 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 A0 90 00 00 00 00 10 50 20 00 00 00 00 30 80 00 00 70 00
F8 80 40 80 00 FA 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 C0 80 00 00 00 00 10 90 00 00 00 00 00 30 00 F0 C0 30 00
F8 80 50 80 00 FA 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 80 80 00 00 00 00 10 10 00 00 00 00 00 20 00 F0 C0 10 00
F8 80 60 80 00 FA 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 70 00 00 00 00 00 00 E0 00 00 00 00 00 20 00 70 80 10 00
F8 80 70 80 00 FA 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 20 00 30 00 10 00
F8 80 80 80 00 FA F0 80 00 10 80 00 00 00 00 C0 00 00 10 F0 E0 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 20 C0 00 00 D0 00
F8 80 90 80 00 FA 40 80 00 00 80 00 00 00 10 20 00 00 20 00 10 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 20 E0 30 10 D0 00
F8 80 A0 80 00 FA 40 30 C0 30 80 C0 D0 00 00 20 00 00 20 00 10 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 20 F0 70 B0 D0 00
F8 80 B0 80 00 FA 70 10 20 40 90 20 60 70 C0 C0 00 00 20 00 10 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 20 F0 70 B0 D0 00
F8 80 C0 80 00 FA 40 10 20 40 90 E0 40 00 00 20 00 00 10 00 20 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 20 E0 30 10 D0 00
F8 80 D0 80 00 FA 40 90 20 40 90 00 40 00 10 20 00 00 10 00 20 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 20 C0 00 00 D0 00
F8 80 E0 80 00 FA F0 B0 B0 30 C0 E0 E0 00 00 C0 00 00 20 00 10 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 20 00 30 00 10 00
F8 80 F0 80 00 FA 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 20 00 10 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 20 00 70 80 10 00
----

This was captured from an V4.2.7 Mainboard:
len: 4865 bits
7C 40 00 40 00 7D 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 38 00 00 00 00 00 00 70 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
7C 40 08 40 00 7D 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 40 48 00 00 00 00 08 08 10 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
7C 40 10 40 00 7D 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 48 50 40 00 00 00 08 18 28 00 00 00 00 18 78 78 78 78 00 
7C 40 18 40 00 7D 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 50 48 00 00 00 00 08 28 10 00 00 00 00 18 40 00 00 38 00 
7C 40 20 40 00 7D 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 60 40 00 00 00 00 08 48 00 00 00 00 00 18 00 78 60 18 00 
7C 40 28 40 00 7D 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 40 40 00 00 00 00 08 08 00 00 00 00 00 10 00 78 60 08 00 
7C 40 30 40 00 7D 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 38 00 00 00 00 00 00 70 00 00 00 00 00 10 00 38 40 08 00 
7C 40 38 40 00 7D 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 10 00 18 00 08 00 
7C 40 40 40 00 7D 78 40 00 08 40 00 00 00 00 60 00 00 08 78 70 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 10 60 00 00 68 00 
7C 40 48 40 00 7D 20 40 00 00 40 00 00 00 08 10 00 00 10 00 08 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 10 70 18 08 68 00 
7C 40 50 40 00 7D 20 18 60 18 40 60 68 00 00 10 00 00 10 00 08 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 10 78 38 58 68 00 
7C 40 58 40 00 7D 38 08 10 20 48 10 30 38 60 60 00 00 10 00 08 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 10 78 38 58 68 00 
7C 40 60 40 00 7D 20 08 10 20 48 70 20 00 00 10 00 00 08 00 10 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 10 70 18 08 68 00 
7C 40 68 40 00 7D 20 48 10 20 48 00 20 00 08 10 00 00 08 00 10 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 10 60 00 00 68 00 
7C 40 70 40 00 7D 78 58 58 18 60 70 70 00 00 60 00 00 10 00 08 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 10 00 18 00 08 00 
7C 40 78 40 00 7D 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 10 00 08 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 10 00 38 40 08 00 
----

The capture frome the V4.2.7 shows that every byte got captured shifted by 1 for some unknown reason
As the displays SPI implementation does not use the last bit of SPI this is not a problem at all.
